ygData.subject: Re: I feel a nerf a coming...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This sounds more related to cleric armor than ours.  For some of their components, they need things that spawn in the world.  However, it takes them hours
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 30 Dec 1999, Tim Burke wrote:

> Just checked EQVault, and there is a post from Gordon about quest armor.

This sounds more related to cleric armor than ours. For some of their
components, they need things that spawn in the world. However, it takes
them hours to appear, and if one person picks it up, another cleric has
lots their shot (so to speak). I feel damn sorry that they have to camp
Bilge for their breastplate.

I very much doubt they will make our quest armor any more difficult to
obtain. I see it (the armor) as, not only our midlife wardrobe, but also
our identifier. If you see someone wearing purple, you know they're a
cleric. Colorful robes are magicians. Warriors are garbed in pale blue.
Rogues can be most often found in black. And what was that deep blue
streak that just flew past?

Athren
